title: PUT/OPEN ATLAS IN DAY MODE - PROD-LIKE

task_list.instruction_title:
If ATLAS PROD-LIKE TX-SERIES IS UP Do

CONTROL-M : TEST
APPLICATION : ATLAS
GROUPE : Ex_MODE-TX-STOP-START
JOB : Ex_30-STOP_AP_TX-SERIES

Set ATLAS PROD-LikeÂ  in DAY Mode

CONTROL-M : TEST
APPLICATION : ATLAS
GROUPE : Ex_MODE-TX-DAY-DAY
JOB : Ex_15-STOP_AV_TX-SERIES
